      • isValidCombo

        public boolean isValidCombo(Flight spiceJet,
                            Flight silkAir,
                            java.time.LocalDate date,
                            int seatReq,
                            java.util.LinkedHashMap<Flight,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> seats)
        Checks if any valid combination of flights exist for the entered details of journey.
        Parameters:
        spiceJet - An object of 'Flight' class.
        silkAir - An object of 'Flight' class.
        date - A 'LocalDate' object.
        seatReq - An integer variable representing the number of seats requested in a booking.
        seats - A LinkedHashMap with keys of 'Flight' type. This represents the number of seats that are vacant.
        Returns:
        Returns true if valid, false otherwise.
